command.name: Echo
command.description: A command that echoes whatever it receives as the response. Useful for testing.

command.name: RegistryReadIntValue
command.description: Command that reads an integer value (REG_DWORD) from the Windows Registry.

command.name: RegistryReadStringValue
command.description: Command that reads a string value (REG_SZ) from the Windows Registry.

command.name: RegistryWriteIntValue
command.description: Command that writes an integer value (REG_DWORD) to the Windows Registry.

command.name: RegistryWriteStringValue
command.description: Command that writes a string value (REG_SZ) to the Windows Registry.

command.name: ShutdownServer
command.description: Command that requests the server to shutdown and terminate.

command.name: SystemParametersInfoGetValue
command.description: Command that invokes the underlying Win32 <c>SystemParametersInfo</c> function that retrieves a value.

command.name: SystemParametersInfoSetValue
command.description: Command that invokes the underlying Win32 <c>SystemParametersInfo</c> function that sets a value.
